content: this squishy scarf was created using just 2 skeins of malabrigo rios scarf is knit from tip to tip one half you increase and the second half you decrease the honeycomb brioche makes the fabric delightful to wrap around your neck and the i-cord edge finishes the scarf nicely yarn 2 skeins malabrigo rios 210 yards/100 g 100% superwash merino wool sample knit in colourway diana gauge 19 sts by 24 row equals 4 by 4 in pattern after blocking needles 5 mm us 8 or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch marker optional darning needle finished size centre depth 12 30 5cm wingspan 84 214cm try to work your i-cord edge sts loosely to avoid a border that is too tight stitch marker is optional at the beginning to mark the right side of the scarf increases and decreases are made every 6th row
